Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents continuing operations
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from debt maturing in more than three months
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt maturing in three months or less
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Repayment of Debt: repayments of debt maturing in more than three months
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: origination of notes receivable from related parties
payments to acquire equipment on lease
proceeds from collection of finance receivables
proceeds from collection of loans receivable
proceeds from divestiture of businesses and interests in affiliates
proceeds from or payments for collateral on derivative instruments investing activities
proceeds from sales of equipment on operating leases
repayment of notes receivable from related parties
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in income taxes payable net of income taxes receivable
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in pension and postretirement
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: business combination step acquisition equity interest in acquiree remeasurement gain
gain loss on sale of business
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
provision for loan lease and other losses

__unmapped__: net cash provided by used in continuing operations
